mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users(password, name, email, birthday, phone_number) Values(SHA2(#{password},256), #{name}, #{email}, #{birthday}, #{phoneNumber})
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET password = SHA2(#{password},256), name = #{name}, email = #{email}, birthday = #{birthday}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE users SET password = SHA2(#{password},256) WHERE email = #{email}
